sentences.en: Clapper talk between two people is one type of clapper talk.
sentences.cn: 对口快板儿是快板的一种形式,由两个人共同表演.

sentences.en: During compression, clapper will slowly move up, away from the seat.
sentences.cn: 在压缩时, 阀瓣将慢慢上移, 离开阀座.

sentences.en: Hebei Bangzi and Yu Opera are two branches of the big system of Bangzi clapper opera.
sentences.cn: 河北梆子与豫剧同属于大梆子系统下的两个分支.

sentences.en: Inspect seats, clapper sealing surfaces, Check Arms, and O - rings for damage.
sentences.cn: 检查阀座 、 阀瓣密封面 、 止回阀臂和O形环是否有损坏.

sentences.en: Leave the cam assembly clapper parallel to valve body.
sentences.cn: 使得凸轮总成阀瓣平行于阀体.

sentences.en: Mr. Obama is calling on the Senate to quickly approve Clapper's nomination.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马呼吁参议院尽快批准对克拉珀的提名.

sentences.en: Playing a small gong, clapper struck the staff and inspection field.
sentences.cn: 打小锣 、 敲梆子的人员兼检场.

sentences.en: President Obama says Clapper's no - nonsense style will be an asset in his new job.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马说,克拉珀严肃的风格将是他新工作中的一大优势.

sentences.en: Remove through access port with back of clapper first with spring end down.
sentences.cn: 首先通过检修口拆卸阀瓣的后面及其弹簧末端.

sentences.en: she ran off like the clappers.
